mapper.sql: log_id, username, operaEvent, ua, clientIp, operaTime, isSuccess
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log (log_id, username, operaEvent, ua, clientIp, operaTime, isSuccess) values (#{logId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operaevent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issuccess,jdbcType=BOOLEAN})
